Our Food Shelf is available to Springfield, No. Springfield and Baltimore residents. Food Shelf Hours: Monday, Tuesday, Friday by appointment: 9am- 11:30 and 12:30 - 2:30pm. *Food Shelf access is every 14 days.   *Fresh Produce and Breads are offered Monday- Friday in our lobby during regular business hours as available (this is separate from Food Shelf visit and does not require an appointment to access).
